name: Halfway
description: Defeat 4 of the Order of No Quarter.
lockedDescription: Defeat 4 of the Order of No Quarter.

rewards.name: Welcome to the Valley

name: Hey Big Spender

lockedDescription: Spend a combined 25000 gold.

rewards.name: Talkative Townsfolk
rewards.description: Witches, Acolytes, Horses, and Goats! Everyone is welcome... but no weapons allowed!

description: Finish any stage without taking damage.
lockedDescription: Finish any stage without taking damage.

name: Impossible!
description: Finish the game without dying.

lockedDescription: Hang in the air for more than 4 seconds using the Dust Knuckles.

lockedDescription: Bounce the same Alchemy Coin 5 times in a row.

lockedDescription: Defeat 3 enemies with one Throwing Anchor.

lockedDescription: Defeat 3 enemies using the Propeller Dagger without touching the ground.
